import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import "./dashboard.css"; import SideBar from "../../sidebar/SideBar"; import axios from "axios"; export default function Dashboard() { const [publishers, setPosts] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const fetchPosts = async () =>{ const res = await axios.get("/publishers") setPosts(res.data) } fetchPosts() }, []) return (
{publishers.map((p) => ( ))}
